title: Introduction to C Programming
details: Learn the fundamentals of C programming language and start your journey into the world of computer programming.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Explore the world of algorithms and problem-solving techniques with this comprehensive course.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Master the C++ programming language and apply it to data structures and algorithms.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Learn the fundamental data structures used in computer science and programming.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Discover the principles of Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) with Python.

title: Software Engineering
details: Gain insights into the world of software engineering and best practices in software development.

title: AWS, Cloud Computing
details: Explore cloud computing and Amazon Web Services (AWS) to build scalable and reliable applications.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Learn the basics of database management and SQL using MySQL.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Sharpen your problem-solving skills and tackle challenging coding problems.
